channel.title: GIMPShop For Windows
channel.description: I've been playing with GIMP lately. Coming from Photoshop, I find the interface really hard to use. Also, the number of windows that GIMP generates it just plain annoying. Obviously I'm not the only person in the world that thinks...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
>I find the interface really hard to use.
...because I'm a windoze user! ;-)
item.dc:creator: Ben

item.title: Comment by DDawg+00:00
item.description: There are other GIMPshop downloads also available at www.gimpshop.com for Windows, Linux, and Mac.
item.dc:creator: DDawg

item.title: Comment by david+00:00
item.description: i think you should add to your post that the hack for windows is nothing more than a background window!
item.dc:creator: david
